channel.title: Google Authenticator on Polin‘s 技術筆記
channel.description: Recent content in Google Authenticator on Polin‘s 技術筆記

item.title: 自建VPN並Google Authenticator MFA驗證
item.description: 關閉所有防火牆 systemctl disable --now firewalld 關閉SELinux sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config reboot now 加入 sysctl.conf net.ipv4.ip_forward = 1 >> /etc/sysctl.conf 安裝OpenVPN首先安裝OpenVPN2.4 跟 easy-rsa 3 yum install epel-release -y yum install openvpn easy-rsa -y 複
